responseText:
That's the spirit! You can't fight off the darkness with a void in your belly!

Every aspiring adventurer should know how to cook up a meal, 'cause the gods know every adventurer is gonna want to eat!

This is an easy recipe. Grow or buy some blackberries, then cook them up with some honeycomb you've bought from a vendor. Bring it back to me when you're done, wouldn't want to make yourself sick!
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_Artisan_Alchemy_Uleni_5_Response
